mapper.select: select * from book order by book_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into book( book_id, book_title, book_author, book_publication_date, book_price, book_publisher, book_page_count, book_genre ) values( book_seq.nextval, #{bookTitle}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublicationDate}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookPageCount}, #{bookGenre} )
